name: Product Analyst
description:
Product analysts work in Product Engineering Team in close interaction with product owners, development team, product designers, tooling and data infrastructure team to validate hypnosis based on data, find insights and new product improvements from the data. Role supposes communication with a people across the globe and work with a lot of non-structured data from different sources.

In this role, you will… 

  • Communicate with product owners, product designers, subject field experts and software developers to get description of problems

  • Work with tooling and core business intelligence team to improve data frameworks needed for the data research

  • Provide structured reports about research results, status and next steps 

In this role, you’ll need …

  • 3+ year experience as Product/Data analyst or any research related position
  • Understanding of root cause analysis methods
  • Ability to transform business problem to formal problem statement
  • Understanding of classifications methods and key metrics (false positive, true positive)
  • Good knowledge of SQL, Python, Excel and desire to learn new applications
  • Analytical thinking
  • Desire to become a subject matter expert


Education

  • Bachelor’s degree or higher in the technical field
